mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FROM oyCode a ( oycdName , oycdDelNy ) values ( #(oycdName) ,0 )
mapper.select: select a.oycdSeq , a.oycdName , a.oycdDelNy from oyCode a where 1=1 and oycdDelNy = 0 and oycdSeq = #{oycdSeq}
select a.oycdSeq , a.oycdName , a.oycdDelNy from oyCode a where 1=1 and oycdDelNy=0
